content: to begin working the border down the side and around the wash cloth border the chain 1 at the beginning of row 1 will not count in the st count round 1 1 single_crochet in each st around the wash cloth working 3 single_crochet into each corner st when you reach the corner you started with join with a slip_stitch into the 1st single_crochet no chain 1 round 2 1 half_double_crochet slip_stitch in each single_crochet around fasten_off and weave in ends page 3 of 5 cloud 9 knots crochet pattern shop © 2024 pattern & photos by nicole mansfield cloud 9 baby washcloth finished i hope you love your baby washcloths and thank you for stitching along with me page 4 of 5 cloud 9 knots crochet pattern shop © 2024 pattern & photos by nicole mansfield cloud 9 baby washcloth if you enjoyed making this pattern check out some of the other fun makes available in my shop thank you don t forget to visit my shop and join my mailing list to be the first to know of new patterns and sales cloud 9 knots crochet pattern shop follow on instagram @cloud9_knots to see new designs in the works free patterns and giveaways find free patterns and updates on the cloud 9 knots blog here page 5 of 5 cloud 9 knots crochet pattern shop © 2024 pattern & photos by nicole mansfield
